description: Detects when a Microsoft Cloud App Security reported a risky sign-in attempt due to a login associated with an impossible travel. Author: Austin Songer @austinsonger. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Microsoft 365 - Impossible Travel Activity
query: (eventSource:"SecurityComplianceCenter" AND eventName:"Impossible\ travel\ activity" AND status:"success")
